description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the S&P MidCap 400® Pure Value Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in the securities that comprise the underlying index. The underlying index is comprised only of those S&P MidCap 400® companies with strong value characteristics as measured using three factors: book to value price ratio, earnings to price ratio, and sales to price ratio. The fund is non-diversified.
